name: Tales of Wedding Rings VR
description: Tales of Wedding Rings VR is a unique and brand new manga experience for VR, brought to you by Square Enix.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4770 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4770 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
